requirements.summary: Revert the Hero section background image to the previously-used artwork and remove usage of the current background image.
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section (frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx) no longer references /assets/generated/anime-hero-bg-moon-waterfall-volcano-sun.dim_1920x1080.png as its background image.
When loading the site, the visible hero background matches the previously-used background artwork (the one used before the most recent background change).
No other sections (About, Characters, Worldbuilding, Episodes, Contact, Admin, Footer) have visual or functional regressions.

file_operations.description: Update the hero section inline backgroundImage to use the previously-used hero background artwork (switch away from /assets/generated/anime-hero-bg-moon-waterfall-volcano-sun.dim_1920x1080.png and restore the prior path, expected to be /assets/generated/anime-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png).

requirements.summary: Ensure the previously-used hero background image file exists in frontend static assets and is served without 404s.
acceptanceCriteria: The previously-used background image file exists in the frontend static assets and loads without 404s in the browser network tab.
The Hero section uses the restored prior background asset path.

file_operations.description: Restore (re-add) the previously-used hero background artwork file as a static asset at this exact path if it is missing from the repository, so it can be served by the frontend without 404s.
